name: dream gallery
author: Pankaj Bachhal

sections.description:
*Details : Dream Gallery plugin is multiple type of gallery you can create simple image gallery.
And grid type gallery and you can also create slider with the dream gallery plugin.
This is Fully responsive in all devices create beautiful galleries sliders and tell your stories to us that how you feel about Dream Gallery.

*Admin section : A beautiful admin section will help you to create a galleries and slider for your beautiful site.
The complete freedom to build what you want, the way you want.

i) Dream page : Dream page is for you first gallery it is the kind of grid gallery.
One thing we want to say that The pattern of uploading images will show the pattern of image in gallery.

ii) Add New page : This page is for creating an another gallery for your beautiful site. Click to choose a file.
And Click on the first image and hold shift and select the last image and then add images. After that you will get a short code from plugin and paste it to your page and enjoy your gallery.

iii) Slider page : This page will help you to create a slider for your site you just have to simply click on the “choose a file” and click on the first image and hold shift and select the last image.
And then add images after that you will get a short code. Copy it and paste it to your page and enjoy your slider.

iv) All Galleries : This page will show your highlight of galleries and slider.

v) Help : This page will guide you that how to use the Dream plugin we will add more questions and answers in this page.

*Support : Dream Plugin is a community-driven project that would not be the same without your feedback.
If you have any problem or feature request for this plugin, please feel free to contact us!

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. A beautiful admin section will help you to create a galleries and slider for your beautiful site.
  2. The complete freedom to build what you want, the way you want.

Unordered list:

  • Dream page is for you first gallery it is the kind of grid gallery.
sections.faq:
How to Create Gallery?

To Create the Gallery simply click on choose a file and submit.

Where can I reach the documentation?

https://dreamreflectionmedia.com/

How to show Dream Gallery in my page?

Just simply add Dream Gallery short code in your page where you want to show Gallery.

Can I get “T”, “L” or Et cetera type of gallery in my page ?

Yes! you can the pattern of uploading file will show the pattern of images in gallery.

what should I do if I choose wrong Image?

In the case you choose wrong image and submit and you want to change that Image just simply click on choose a file and select the new image and submit.

How do I select multiple images?

Just simply click on the first image and press shift and click on last image.

How do I add ?

Just simply click on the first image and press shift and click on last image

What should I do when I experience any problem?

Contact us at team@dreamreflectionmedia.com
